release_notes.en-US: This version fixes the following issue: https://github.com/heisencoder/keyfixer/issues/2 In this bug, TextAreas and InputFields would disappear. This has been resolved by getting a new baseline for the platformHTMLBindings.xml file, which included a bindToUntrustedContent="true" annotation on the keybindings for TextAreas and InputFields.

release_notes.en-US:
This version contains compatibility updates for Firefox version 4.0, but otherwise contains no functional changes.

This version does not work (well) with Firefox 29 and higher, and breaks in an impressive fashion on Firefox 34 by removing text boxes.

release_notes.en-US: Adjusted max version for Thunderbird from 3.0.* to 3.1.*.  No changes to core add-on
